ray_trace¶

Ionospheric radio propagation effects studied using ray-tracing.

2016-2018 Juha Vierinen

NOT UPDATED FOR NEW INFRASTRUCTURE

ray_trace.get_delay(dn=datetime.datetime(2016, 3, 23, 0, 0), f=233000000.0, lat=69.34023844, lon=20.313166, elevation=30.0, plot=False)[source]¶
